AccessKeyId.description: The unique identifier for the AWS access key used during the event.

CloudTrailEvent.description: The raw CloudTrail event data associated with the management event.

EventId.description: The identifier for the specific event recorded in CloudTrail.

EventName.description: The name of the management event that occurred.

EventSource.description: The service that the API call was made to.

EventTime.description: The timestamp when the event occurred.

ReadOnly.description: Indicates whether the event was a read-only operation.

Resources.description: Information about the resources affected by the management event.

ResourceName.description: The name of the affected resource.

ResourceType.description: The type of the affected resource.

Username.description: The username associated with the event.
